page.title: 09Industry in W.Itchenor
page.content: {Northshore Boat Yard,}established pre-war, is the largest industry in the area, employing 69, specialising in building{Southerly}and{Fisher} craft. They provide facilities for yachtsmen and maintain 40 moorings. { Bailey & Son,}established 1920, maintain and sell craft, mainly{ {Fletcher Speedboats}and the{Dell Quay {Dory.}They also sell boat engines and have 6 moorings and employ 6 staff. {Haines Boat Yard,}established in 1914, repairs, fits out various types of craft; has storage facilities; maintains and lays moorings.{ {H.C.Darley & Son}are the main yacht chandlers. They repair and service small boats, have 30 moorings and employ 2 plus 3 in the family. {The Ship Inn}providing drinks, meals, & overnight accommodation, employs 18 staff.
